sentences.en: A problem came to Clark's armored army in the north!
sentences.cn: 克拉克的装甲营在北部遇到困难了!

sentences.en: Allied M 8 Armored Car Armor upgrade Munitions cost reduced by 25.
sentences.cn: 美军M8装甲车的装甲升级所需弹药资源减少25.

sentences.en: Armored forces are required to drive all the tanks.
sentences.cn: 装甲兵必须能驾驶各种坦克.

sentences.en: Drawing major production of electric vehicles , armored cars and full - kiln car parts.
sentences.cn: 主要生产电动拉坯车 、 装窑车及全车零部件.

sentences.en: Enemies include armored car, combat car, light tank and heavy tank.
sentences.cn: 敌人包括披甲的汽车, 轻型坦克, 轻型坦克和重的坦克.

sentences.en: Exciting shoot'em up phases in an armored four - wheel drive vehicle.
sentences.cn: 激动人心的射击阶段,逐步采用装甲设备.

sentences.en: I've got some information on the money stolen from the armored truck.
sentences.cn: 我在这些被抢得钱里面查到了些东西.

sentences.en: Its body is covered with armored hide and small boney spikes.
sentences.cn: 它的身体覆盖着盔甲似的皮革和小骨刺.

sentences.en: My armored divisions must be moved to the coast.
sentences.cn: 我的装甲师必须全部开往海岸.

sentences.en: The King was thinking of sending an armored brigade into Syria.
sentences.cn: 国王正考虑派遣一旅装甲部队前往叙利亚.

sentences.en: Thee first "standard" battleship of the Tech Tree armored according to the "all or nothing" concept.
sentences.cn: 第一艘按照觨“全有或全没有”的理念进行装甲设计的标准级别战列舰。

sentences.en: They surrounded the building with tanks and armored vehicles.
sentences.cn: 他们用坦克和装甲车包围了大楼。

sentences.en: This makes the Warp Ray very potent against heavily - armored targets.
sentences.cn: 这样便使得“曲线激光”对付重装甲目标非常有效.

sentences.en: Thousands of tanks, artillery pieces and armored vehicles will be cut up for scrap.
sentences.cn: 成千上万的坦克、大炮和装甲车将被切割成废金属。

sentences.en: We can guarantee the punctual arrival of the armored cars in foggy weather.
sentences.cn: 雾天我们能保证装甲车准时到达。

sentences.en: When does your armored truck make its pickup?
sentences.cn: 你们的运炒车什么时候过来收走这些钱?

sentences.en: When I see these articles I always remember the German Tiger 1 that attacked an entire armored column, alone.
sentences.cn: 当我看到这类型的文章时，我总是会想起德国虎1坦克独自攻击整个装甲纵队的情景。

words.tran_cn: 武装的；有扶手的；有防卫器官的（指动物）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 钢筋混凝土；钢筋水泥

trans.tran_cn: 装甲的，配备有装甲车辆的
为…穿盔甲（或加置装甲） ( armor的过去式和过去分词 )，为…提供防御
